title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, November 2, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of the ill fated, and much maligned, Queen of France Marie-Antoinette (1755) who lost her head to the French Revolution.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of the ill fated, and much maligned, Queen of France Marie-Antoinette (1755) who lost her head to the French Revolution.
